welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ocean City, where the sun, sand, and sea await you! Known for its charming boardwalk and beautiful beaches, we invite you to relax, explore, and experience all that our coastal city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Atlantic City International Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cape May County Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Cape May County Airport is used for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private jet passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
